attributes.action: Make it illegal for illegal for Clothing/shoe retailers to discriminate against or profiteer from people based on their size
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment anyone who needs to buy clothing/shoes which is "outsize" are forced to go to "specialist" shops (High & Mighty, etc...) These "specialist" shops knowing that they are the only place that "outsize" people can obtain clothing/shoes in their size add further insult to injury by charging more than the "normally" sized item. for example: i take a size 14 shoe. i have to pay a minimum of £70 in a specialist shop whereas a size 12 can be bought at a high street chain that i know for as little as £15. Such profiteering is immoral and should be legislated against
